alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Richland (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 09 at 3:24AM CST until February 09 at 6:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Heavy Snow Still Possible in Grant County...Elsewhere Snow Totals were Reduced... .It continues to look like the the winter storm will track further southeast than originally expected today. Due to this, there was a reduction in the snow totals for much of the area. The Snow Advisory was cancelled for Adams, Juneau, and Vernon counties in southwest and central Wisconsin, and Allamakee and Fayette counties in northeast Iowa. The Winter Storm Warning was downgraded to Winter Weather Advisory in Clayton County in northeast Iowa. Grant County remains in the Winter Storm Warning with 3 to 7 inches of snow expected. The highest totals will be across the southern half of this county. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Highest totals will be in the southern portions of these counties. * WHERE...Crawford and Richland Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
